transcript: if you ever feel really stressed one day if you're like man I have a lot of anxiety like there's a lot of stuff going on just try this put earplugs in put headphones on top you will literally feel the world get quieter all of a sudden you're like it gets you into a little bit more of a meditative State because the only thing you can hear is your breath for me when I work imagine this environment I have this massive screen so the only thing I look at is my work I have no windows I have a timer that's keeping me on task and I have two things stopping any noise from getting in my work per unit of time that I'm allocating to it goes up by a lot
